language.entry: A rare delicacy. A taste relieves a little {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} and grants a positive outlook!
The Tavern may give us a fair rate in exchange for this.
My virility will NOT be denied!
I once had crab prepared in the city of Monico.
It's a little odd, but I like it.
It has a funny smell, it's fishy.
I'd rather use in a ritual but it doesn't stay fresh for long.
Perhaps we should find more? We could make a handsome profit.
My former crew enjoyed Blue Crab!
Food from the sea, a refreshing change of pace!
{colour_start|pet_a}It's hard to fight when you're scared to be caged.{colour_end}
{colour_start|pet_a}Anger for the Pet Patrol gives you inner strength.{colour_end}
{colour_start|pet_a}You are horrified to learn the legends were true!{colour_end}
{colour_start|pet_a}You discovered a vunerable area of this fabled creature!{colour_end}
*Terrified* They will cage us all! We should flee!
I will take revenge on these Pet Patrol cowards!
This ... this Monster will DESTROY Us!
I have gained insight about this fabled beast!

{colour_start|healhp}Melodious Heal: {colour_end}On Monster Kill: +4 Party HP (5%% Chance)
{colour_start|stress}Divine Intervention:{colour_end} On Monster Kill: {colour_start|bleed}Party Cure Bleed{colour_end} (20%% Chance)
{colour_start|debuff}Canine Bite:{colour_end} On Hit: {colour_start|debuff}-3 Dodge/-3 PROT{colour_end} (2 Rds)
{colour_start|harmful}Feeding Frenzy:{colour_end} On Kill: {colour_start|harmful}+20%% Damage/+2 CRIT{colour_end} (2 rds)
The Pet Patrol hunts animals in the Warrens, Weald, and the Cove for training and testing. If you defeat a Patrol, you will free an animal who may become a loyal companion! Look to the Warrens first.
Besides plot quests, the {colour_start|pet_a}Pet Patrol{colour_end} has a low chance to appear inside any dungeon in the Warrens, Weald or Cove. So stay alert!
Defeat the Apprentice Pet Catcher in the Warrens
{?hero_names}%s traveled the Warrens, to defeat the Pet Patrol. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Defeat the Apprentice Pet Catcher in the Warrens
The Pet Patrol has cruelly trained animals to follow their commands!
{?hero_names}%s was killed fighting an Apprentice Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s freed a Pet from an Apprentice Pet Catcher, however the Pet Catcher got away! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The Apprentice Pet Catcher was defeated
Animals in the Warrens will be safe, for a short time at lesat ...

Defeat the Apprentice Pet Catcher and his squad to free any captured animals. {colour_start|yellow}Note:{colour_end} This quest starts the {colour_start|pet_a}Pets{colour_end} adventure chain, where you can earn {colour_start|pet_a}Pet Trinkets{colour_end}. Look for the second quest in the Cove, but you may have to defeat other bosses first.
Stop Senior Pet Catcher in the Warrens
{?hero_names}%s explored the Warrens, to stop the Senior Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Stop Senior Pet Catcher in the Warrens
There's a much larger area to explore this time, so use your supplies only when needed.
{?hero_names}%s was lost in the Warrens trying to defeat the Senior Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s freed another pet in the Warrens, but the Senior Pet Catcher escaped. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Stop Senior Pet Catcher in the Warrens
The Senior Pet Catcher will hunt this part of the Warrens no longer.
Stop Senior Pet Catcher in the Warrens
A more experienced {colour_start|pet_a}Senior Pet Catcher{colour_end} has been dispatched to continue the work of the Pet Patrol in this region. Stop him!
Vanquish the Executive Pet Catcher in the Warrens
{?hero_names}%s explored the Warrens, to vanquish the Executive Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The Paths you choose could make all the difference for surviving this twisted place. Good luck!
{?hero_names}%s was defeated by the Executive Pet Catcher in the Warrens. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s confronted the Executive Pet Catcher, who escaped to the cove! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The heros confronted the Executive Pet Catcher, who escaped to the cove!

The {colour_start|pet_a}Executive Pet Catcher{colour_end} runs the entire operation! He has hidden himself deep in the Warrens, but you must vanquish him! Buy all the Bandages, Antivenom, Medicinal Herbs, Laudanum, Shovels, and Food you can carry.
{?hero_names}%s explored the Tunnel that was shown to you by a Pet. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
This tunnel has a calm, healing aura, however something or someone may still lurk here.
{?hero_names}%s was lost in the Odd Tunnel. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s explored an odd tunnel that cured negative quirks! Were the Pets thanking you? ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The heros explored an Odd Tunnel!

One of the Pets, carrying a torch in his mouth, seems eager for you to follow ... the Pet won't stop nudging and pestering you, so you decide to follow along ... until you reach an entrance to an odd tunnel ...
Track the Apprentice Pet Catcher to the Weald
{?hero_names}%s chased the Apprentice Pet Catcher deep into the Weald. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Since the Pet Catcher Assistant is charged with Healing, it's a good idea to eliminate him first!
{?hero_names}%s was defeated chasing the Apprentice Pet Catcher in the Weald. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s killed the Apprentice Pet Catcher! He will never harm another animal. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
You have finally beaten the Apprentice Pet Catcher!
You have trapped the {colour_start|pet_a}Apprentice Pet Catcher{colour_end} in the twisted paths of the Weald. There will be no escape this time! Defeat him and free another animal to aid you!
Terminate the Senior Pet Catcher in the Weald
{?hero_names}%s followed paths in the Weald to find the Senior Pet Catcher ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Terminate the Senior Pet Catcher in the Weald
Don't get lost in the twisting paths here! The Pet Catcher may have laid traps!
{?hero_names}%s was killed searching for the Senior Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s terminated the Senior Pet Catcher. Hopefully, leading to the end of the Pet Patrol! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Terminate the Senior Pet Catcher in the Weald
The Senior Pet Catcher, and his squad, were defeated in the Weald.
Terminate the Senior Pet Catcher in the Weald
The {colour_start|pet_a}Senior Pet Catcher{colour_end} is making his last stand in a maze-like portion of the Weald. Put an end to his animal cruelty ... forever.
Conquer the Executive Pet Catcher in the Weald
{?hero_names}%s traveled into the Weald, hoping to conquer the Executive Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
End the reign of the organized Pet Patrol! Though other, lesser trainees may still roam the lands, you will have done a great service -- if you succeed!
{?hero_names}%s was annihilated by the Executive Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
You conquered the the Executive Pet Catcher.

The {colour_start|pet_a}Executive Pet Catcher{colour_end} is making his last stand here. It will not be easy ... Conquer him for the Pets! Buy all the Bandages, Antivenom, Medicinal Herbs, Laudanum, Shovels, and Food you can carry. Good Luck.
Follow the Apprentice Pet Catcher to the Cove
{?hero_names}%s set off to explore the Cove, trying to catch up to the Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The Pet Catcher's minions have been mercilessly trained for combat!
{?hero_names}%s was killed in the Cove, trying to defeat the Apprentice Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s managed to defeat the Apprecentice Pet Catcher, but he did escape again! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The Apprentice Pet Catcher was tracked down to the Cove and fought a second time.
The {colour_start|pet_a}Apprentice Pet Catcher{colour_end} -- the coward that he is -- escaped to Cove and gathered additional forces. Catch and defeat him!
Confront the Senior Pet Catcher in the Cove
{?hero_names}%s ventured into the Cove, trying to catch the Senior Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Confront the Senior Pet Catcher in the Cove
This part of the Cove is deeper than your previous outing here. The Senior Pet Catcher will be harder to find.
{?hero_names}%s was slain while tracking the Senior Pet Catcher in the Cove. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s caught up to the Senior Pet Catcher in the Cove and freed a pet, however the coward fled again heading South. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Confront the Senior Pet Catcher in the Cove
The Senior Pet Catcher was confronted.
Confront the Senior Pet Catcher in the Cove
The {colour_start|pet_a}Senior Pet Catcher{colour_end} is trying to lose you in the twisted caves of the Cove. Supply your party well and summon all of your courage!
Chase the Executive Pet Catcher to the Cove
{?hero_names}%s adventured into the Cove, trying to find the Executive Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The Pet Catcher has a distinct advantage; the caves are long and confusing, and you risk running out of supplies before finding him!
{?hero_names}%s was defeated in the Cove trying to chase the Executive Pet Catcher. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s found and fought the Executive Pet Catcher, who fled the Cove like a coward! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)

The {colour_start|pet_a}Executive Pet Catcher{colour_end} fled to the Cove in an effort to lose you. He is hidden deep inside a complicated system of caves. Buy all the Bandages, Antivenom, Medicinal Herbs, Laudanum, Shovels, and Food you can carry.

{colour_start|stress}Extremely rare, this Unicorn may travel with any Hero.{colour_end}
{colour_start|stress}Not completely understood, Unicorns may have{colour_end}{colour_start|yellow} Additional Effects!{colour_end}
